page.title: 19POTTERS CORNER (1)
page.content:
{Potters Corner}is a sprawling village extending along two minor roads joined to the{A20 Trunk road.
The main{Ashford/London}railway cuts right through the village though under bridges.
The village has a{public house}and is adjacent to a{golf course}and is close to{The Warren}recreation area.
However the village is likely to suffer a great deal from noise lying as it does on the main line railway and between, on the one side, the{A20 {Trunk road}and on the other side, the extention of the{M20 Motor-way.}All within half a mile distance.
